Simple things. Made of paper.

Paper (presumably from Italian "bombagia," with the original source believed to be Persian) is a fibrous material with mineral additives

The result of your training.

Maximum whiteness.

To enhance whiteness, smoothness, and softness, white mineral substances such as chalk, talc, kaolin, and others are introduced into the paper pulp. This process is called filling.
The deckle edge of a paper sheet is created on a papermaking machine, the most important part of which is a continuously moving (like a conveyor) metal or nylon mesh.

Made from kraft paper or heavy cardboard. Packaging comes in various shapes and colors; custom shapes can be created upon request.
